me still being a cheerleader for the democratic party because i think it's you know in in a and
i know i am a little bit of a cheerleader for the democratic party because no because we got

don't ever want to be in a position where i'm pretending that that's not the case and people like you know
joe biden winning is a our salvation i am so critical of joe biden and i am so grateful with
every fiber of my being that he's a president both those things can be true and i think it's actually
incumbent on me to like work on thinking about both those things simultaneously but i wouldn't
give in to the critical part if i thought this was just the best we could ever get right i think
